text: Farmington is an unincorporated community in Oconee County, Georgia, United States. The community is located along U.S. Routes 129/441, south-southeast of Bishop. Farmington has a post office with ZIP code 30638. ==History== The Georgia General Assembly incorporated the place in 1919 as the "Town of Farmington". The community was so named on account of its location within a farming district. The town's municipal charter was repealed in 1995. ==References== Category:Former municipalities in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Unincorporated communities in Oconee County, Georgia Category:Unincorporated communities in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Populated places disestablished in 1995
title: Farmington, Georgia
